scripts.transfers:mainnet: npx dotenv -e ./env/.transfers.mainnet.env apibara dev --preset mainnet --indexers transfers
scripts.transfers:sepolia: npx dotenv -e ./env/.transfers.sepolia.env apibara dev --preset sepolia --indexers transfers
scripts.tokenkit:mainnet: npx dotenv -e ./env/.tokenkit.mainnet.env apibara dev --preset mainnet --indexers tokenkit
scripts.tokenkit:sepolia: npx dotenv -e ./env/.tokenkit.sepolia.env apibara dev --preset sepolia --indexers tokenkit
